dict.acceptation: 程度；长度；广大地域；扣押；

sent.orig: These questions are important problems puzzle theoretical extent and practical extent through.
sent.trans: 这些问题一直是困扰理论界与实务界的重大难题。

sent.orig: If you are interested only in your regular occupation, you are alive only to that extent.
sent.trans: 如果你只对正常的工作感兴趣，那你生活的范围也就仅仅局限于此。

sent.orig: The extent laid on the house by court made the insolvent man homeless.
sent.trans: 法院对这个破产者房产的扣押使他无家可归。

sent.orig: These were strengthened to a great extent by her claim that she was guided by Masters.
sent.trans: 在很大程度上由于她说她是接受大师们的指导而强化。

sent.orig: The unbundled network components shall be assigned to individual Licensed Service segments, to the extent possible.
sent.trans: 网路元件按功能分类后，应再按业务种类予以细分。
